thread.title: Amazon Best Deals To Shop Right Now in January
thread.title_full: Amazon Best Deals To Shop Right Now in January

author: Francisco Bernard
title: Amazon Best Deals To Shop Right Now in January
text: These are some of the Amazon finds you need to know about It’s a new year, which means you might be wanting to treat yourself to ring in the new year, or you have some goals you want to accomplish this year, but need some gadgets or devices to help you out on your endeavors. Maybe you’re looking to upgrade kitchen appliances, need some items that make your travel experience easier, or want to track your health better. Whatever that may be, we’re here to help. Related video above: New Year's resolutions mental health experts encourage you to make We took a look on Amazon as they were having a winter sale and we found these items that could help you out. [Fitbit trackers](https://www.amazon.com/deal/ddfb444e?showVariations=true&pf_rd_r=VQ4XB86THVY0JVBR7134&pf_rd_t=Events&pf_rd_i=deals&pf_rd_p=4ec8afa9-2097-4b21-a8c6-defe88813034&pf_rd_s=slot-14&ref=dlx_deals_gd_dcl_img_15_ddfb444e_dt_sl14_34&tag=vuz0e-20) - Want to keep track of vitals like your resting heart rate or how many steps you’ve walked in a day? We found multiple Fitbit trackers available at a discounted price. We even [found one](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0B5FGP237?tag=vuz0e-20) under $100. [Waterpik cordless water flosser](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01GNVF8S8?tag=vuz0e-20) - Help get those hard-to-reach areas and improve your dental hygiene with this water flosser. Just add warm water, place the tip in your mouth, and start flossing. [Under-bed storage containers](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B094J8QKF3?tag=vuz0e-20) - Decluttering and organization top of mind this year? This six-pack of storage containers can fit underneath your bed and keep anything from bedding to clothes. [Foot Spa](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000TK8RCO?tag=vuz0e-20) - Self-care is typically top of mind entering a new year. So how about a foot spa that’s under $20 you can use whenever you want at home? [Neck pillow](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07SRRQS5B?tag=vuz0e-20) - Long flights on the horizon? Consider a neck pillow for your travels and we found this particular pillow at 46% off its original price. [DEWALT kit](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00ET5VMTU?tag=vuz0e-20) - Looking to tackle some home improvement projects in 2024? We found this top-rated kit for under $100. [Snap N Strain pot strainer ](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B081FGJHC9?tag=vuz0e-20)- Save space in your kitchen and make cooking so much easier with this nifty gadget. It snaps onto your pot and lets you drain water from your pasta, veggies, whatever you’re cooking. And it’s under $15. [Clean Skin Club Clean Towels XL](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07PBXXNCY?tag=vuz0e-20) - If you’re looking to have better skincare in 2024, consider these face towels. Not only can it help with face-cleaning, but it can even remove makeup and masks. [Robot vacuum and mop combo](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0CJRP4Q8P?tag=vuz0e-20) - Trying to tidy up better? A robot vacuum is a popular pick for helping out, but this one we found can not only vacuum, it can mop your floors too. [Nordictrack Commercial Studio Cycle](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08KBWQ9FJ?tag=vuz0e-20) - We found this top-rated at-home studio bike available at 40% off its original price, so if you were looking to have something at home to help with being active, this could be a good choice.
